english_example_sentence: If you teach this topic to my little brother, I would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты научишь моего младшего брата этой теме, я буду очень рад.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük kardeşime bu konuyu öğretsen, çok sevinirim.
